lead_paragraph: Charges have been brought against three young women who said they were attacked by white men on a city bus, revealing discord at the University at Albany.

headline.print_headline: Racism Allegations, and Their Unraveling, Upset a College Campus
headline.main: Racism Charges in Bus Incident, and Their Unraveling, Upset University at Albany

snippet: Charges have been brought against three young women who said they were attacked by white men on a city bus, revealing discord at the University at Albany.
abstract: State University of New York at Albany students Asha Burwell, Alexis Briggs and Ariel Agudio plead not guilty to charges of misdemeanor assault, while Burwell and Agudio plead not guilty to making false report; charges stem from incident in which students claimed they were attacked by group of white men on city bus, which authorities say is not true; claim caused furor on campus and led to protests and rallies.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: State University of New York at Albany
